abstract: The results of the recount will be available within two weeks, a company spokesman said.
snippet: The results of the recount will be available within two weeks, a company spokesman said.
lead_paragraph: The shareholder vote on an executive pay proposal at Verizon Communications is too close to call and must go to a recount, the company said after its annual meeting in Pittsburgh yesterday. The results of the recount will be available within two weeks, a company spokesman said.

headline.main: Verizon Vote on Pay Levels to Be Decided in a Recount
headline.print_headline: Verizon Vote On Pay Levels To Be Decided In a Recount
